title: 2014: Songs of the Year 80 – 61
body:

King Krule_ 75. **Todd Terje **– _Inspector Norse_ 74. **Blaue Blume **– _In Disco Lights_ 73. **Aurora **– _Awakening_ 72. **Leon Bridges **– _Coming Home_ 71. **Marika Hackman **– _Drown_ 70. **Angel Olsen **– _Lights Out_ 69. **X Priest X **– _Isn’t It So_ 68. **SOPHIE **– _Lemonade_ 67. **Bully **– _Milkman_ 66. **REID **– _Fractures feat. Slow Skies_ 65. **Sam Smith **– _Stay With Me_ 64. **Oyinda **– _What Still Remains_ 63. **Vince Staples **– _Blue Suede_ 62. **BANKS **– _Beggin’ For Thread_ 61. **Gengahr **– _Powder_ Spotify Playlist coming once the full list has been announced.
